questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A fire hydrant
C) A statue
D) A person

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A bench
B) A fire hydrant
C) A fountain
D) A car

What type of hydrant is shown in the photo?
A) Water hydrant
B) Fire hydrant
C) Gas hydrant
D) Oil hydrant

What color is the fire hydrant?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Cream
D) Blue

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Buildings
B) Trees and grass
C) Cars
D) People

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A road
B) Manhole cover and a fire hydrant
C) A bench
D) A playground

What is the condition of the fire hydrant?
A) New and shiny
B) Rusty and old
C) Broken
D) Painted recently

What is the ground around the fire hydrant covered with?
A) Snow
B) Grass and dry leaves
C) Sand
D) Water

What is the small circular object near the fire hydrant?
A) A manhole cover
B) A flower pot
C) A trash bin
D) A bird bath

Is there any shadow in the photo?
A) Yes, from the fire hydrant and from a tree
B) No shadows are visible
C) Yes, from a tree
D) Yes, from a building

What is the texture of the ground around the hydrant?
A) Wet and muddy
B) Dry and grassy
C) Snowy
D) Sandy

What is the state of the grass in the photo?
A) Fully green and lush
B) Partially dry and patchy
C) Completely brown
D) Covered in flowers

What is the fire hydrant missing?
A) A hose
B) A cap
C) A chain
D) A sign

What is the main color of the grass in the photo?
A) Brown
B) Green
C) Yellow
D) All of the above

How many outlets does the fire hydrant have?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the purpose of the fire hydrant?
A) Decoration
B) Water supply for firefighting
C) Plant watering
D) Drinking water source

What is the texture of the fire hydrant?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and rusty
C) Painted and clean
D) Covered in moss

What is the fire hydrant made of?
A) Wood
B) Plastic
C) Metal
D) Stone

What is the state of the manhole cover?
A) Broken
B) Intact and closed
C) Open
D) Missing

What is the shape of the fire hydrant?
A) Cylindrical
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Spherical

How is the fire hydrant positioned?
A) Lying on the ground
B) Upright and standing
C) Leaning to one side
D) Buried halfway

What is the likely use of the manhole cover?
A) Access to underground utilities
B) Decorative purpose
C) Trash disposal
D) Wildlife habitat

What is the state of the area surrounding the fire hydrant?
A) Dry and not maintained
B) Littered with trash
C) Overgrown with weeds
D) Covered in snow

What is the condition of the chain on the fire hydrant?
A) Rusty
B) New and shiny
C) Missing
D) Painted

What is the texture of the grass around the fire hydrant?
A) Soft and lush
B) Dry and brittle
C) Wet and muddy
D) Covered in flowers

What is the condition of the manhole cover's surface?
A) Smooth and clean
B) Rusty and old
C) Cracked and broken
D) Painted and new

What is the fire hydrant's cap used for?
A) Sealing the outlet
B) Decoration
C) Holding a hose
D) Measuring water pressure

What is the state of the fire hydrant's paint?
A) Fresh and new
B) Faded and chipped
C) Completely gone
D) Covered in graffiti

What is the fire hydrant's role in the community?
A) Aesthetic
B) Safety
C) Entertainment
D) Educational

What is the fire hydrant's chain used for?
A) Decoration
B) Securing the cap, and prevent it from falling
C) Holding a sign
D) Attaching a hose

What is the fire hydrant's outlet used for?
A) Drinking water
B) Firefighting
C) Irrigation
D) Decorative

What is the fire hydrant's primary function?
A) Providing drinking water
B) Firefighting
C) Plant watering
D) Decorative

What is located near the fire hydrant?
A) A tree
B) A sidewalk
C) A manhole cover
D) A bench

What is the condition of the grass around the fire hydrant?
A) Lush and green
B) Dry and patchy
C) Covered in snow
D) Full of flowers

What is the texture of the ground around the fire hydrant?
A) Sandy
B) Rocky
C) Grassy
D) Muddy
